text:
NEW: #COVID19 cases continue to spread at alarming rates in some CA counties.
 
CA is now asking Napa, San Benito, and Yolo to close indoor operations for:

-Restaurants
-Wineries
-Movie theaters
-Zoos, museums
-Cardrooms

Bars must close ALL operations.
